an2.157:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two kinds of gifts to present to a guest.[n.330]Ātitheyyāni.Mpglosses withāgantukadānāni, "gifts to a guest."What two? The gift of material goods and the gift of the Dhamma. These are the two kinds of gifts to present to a guest. Of these two kinds of gifts to present to a guest, the gift of the Dhamma is foremost."
